Question: Israel Pavilion CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Israel Pavilion CES 2024

ARTI

- Tools for adding 3D graphics to a video stream in real-time without hardware or design skills
- Enhances engagement and memorability of webinars, Zoom calls, Twitch streams, sales, or training videos

Carteav

- Transforms electric golf carts into self-driving LSVs for transportation in regulation-free areas
- Service tested in senior communities in Israel and soon in Turkey

CorrActions

- Enables cars to detect cognitive impairment states like fatigue, inattention, and alcohol/drug influence using motion sensors
- Partnerships with Volkswagen and Hyundai

EZinGrow

- Controller that turns off-the-shelf pots into "smart habitats" for controlling plant growing parameters
- Cloud-based service with no horticulture experience required

Hailo

- Develops specialized AI processors for edge devices like cameras and autonomous vehicles
- Hailo-8 processor offers 26 tera-operations per second in a small form factor

iRomaScents

- Device loaded with up to 45 fragrances for on-demand release
- Can be used for movies, shopping, and cooking programs

Nimble Beauty

- Autonomous nail painting system for home use
- Robotic arm applies base coat, color, and topcoat with warm air drying

Resight

- Builds a visual index of the world for linking users, apps, and AR content to physical locations
- Creates 3D virtual "objects" for the metaverse

Visionary.ai

- Applies computer vision and AI to improve image and video quality in low light conditions
- Partnerships with leading technology companies
Summary_cn:
以色列展馆 CES 2024

ARTI

- 在没有硬件或设计技能的情况下，实时向视频流中添加3D图形的工具
- 提升网络研讨会、Zoom会议、Twitch直播、销售或培训视频的参与度和记忆度

Carteav

- 将电动高尔夫车转变为自动驾驶的低速车辆，用于在无监管区域进行交通运输
- 在以色列的老年社区进行了服务测试，很快将在土耳其展开测试

CorrActions

- 使用动作传感器使汽车能够检测认知障碍状态，如疲劳、注意力不集中和酒精/药物影响
- 与大众和现代汽车达成合作伙伴关系

EZinGrow

- 控制器将现成的花盆转化为可控制植物生长参数的“智能栖息地”
- 无需园艺经验的基于云的服务

Hailo

- 开发专门针对相机和自动驾驶车辆等边缘设备的AI处理器
- Hailo-8处理器以小巧的外形提供每秒26万亿次运算

iRomaScents

- 装有多达45种香气，可按需释放的设备
- 可用于电影、购物和烹饪节目

Nimble Beauty

- 用于家庭使用的自动涂甲系统
- 机器臂使用底漆、彩色和面漆，并配有温风烘干

Resight

- 为用户、应用程序和增强现实内容与实际位置建立一个视觉索引，实现链接
- 创建用于元宇宙的3D虚拟“物体”

Visionary.ai

- 应用计算机视觉和人工智能改善低光条件下的图像和视频质量
- 与领先的技术公司合作伙伴关系
